title: Ethiopia's state of emergency to last for 6 months
text:
Ethiopia's state of emergency to last for 6 months 10:13pm IST - 01:35 
A state of emergency imposed in Ethiopia a day after the prime minister resigned will last for six months, the defence minister said on Saturday, as authorities sought to tamp down unrest in Africa's second most populous nation. Lucy Fielder reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
